reviews.text:
I had an excellent experience at Surinder & Sumeeta Dental Clinic in Ipoh, where I went for scaling, orthodontic treatment, and post-treatment care. The team is professional, friendly, and truly cares about their patients. Dr. Surinder and Dr. Sumeetha were both highly skilled and made every procedure comfortable and stress-free.

One of the standout features of this clinic is its accessibility for senior citizens‚Äîthey have stair lifts, making it easy for elderly patients to reach the clinic without hassle. This thoughtful facility sets them apart from many other clinics.

The clinic is well-maintained, the staff is welcoming, and appointments are well-organized with minimal waiting time. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for quality dental care in Ipoh!

reviews.name: Krithiga Athinathan
reviews.text:
I recently had a dental implant procedure done at Surinder & Sumeeta Dental Clinic, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the results. From the initial consultation to the final restoration, the entire process was smooth and professionally handled.

Dr. Sumeeta took the time to explain every step, making sure I was comfortable and well-informed. The procedure itself was virtually painless, and their advanced technology ensured precise placement. The post-procedure care was excellent, with the team checking in on my recovery.

Now, my implant feels just like a natural tooth - strong, secure, and perfectly blended with my smile. If you're considering dental implants, I highly recommend Surinder & Sumeeta Dental Clinic for their expertise, professionalism, and outstanding patient care. Thank you for restoring my confidence to smile again Dr. Sumeeta üòÅ.

reviews.name: Yong Ks
reviews.text:
I recently experienced a tooth fracture near a pre-existing damaged area of the same tooth. Despite it being 6 pm, the clinic typically closing time, I managed to secure an appointment. Dr. Leong, displaying incredible kindness and professional ethics, extended her working hours to attend to me. I'm truly impressed by her dedication to putting patients first. Words can't express my gratitude for Dr. Leong's meticulous work in restoring both damaged areas to perfection. Although grateful, I also feel remorseful for causing the clinic staff to stay back until 6:45 pm. A heartfelt thank you to Dr. Leong for her exceptional care today. She's the best dentist in Ipoh, and my entire family receives dental care here. Highly recommend.

29 September 2024
Today I went for cleaning of my tea-stained teeth, this time treated by Dr. Shirley Ng Khai Chien. Prior to this, I had a unpleasant experience with another dentist, where my teeth became very sensitive for 3 months after a dental cleaning. This time, it was different. Dr Ng provided me with a chewable blue pill that highlighted the unclean areas on my teeth. The cleaning process was smooth and painless. The doctor was very professional, patient, careful, and gentle. I'm very happy and satisfied with the service.

I had an amazing experience at Happy Dental Clinic with Dr. Lim! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was welcoming and comfortable. The clinic itself is very well-maintained, and the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful.

Dr. Lim is by far the most gentle and caring dentist I‚Äôve ever seen. He took the time to explain every step of the process and made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire procedure. I really appreciated how open he was to answering all of my questions, which made me feel at ease. It‚Äôs clear that he genuinely cares about his patients' experience.

He acknowledged my past dental trauma and made me feel supported and understood, which was very comforting. I also love that the clinic follows up with you through text to check on your condition after your appointment. It shows how much they truly care about their patients.

This has been the best dental experience I‚Äôve ever had, and I highly recommend Happy Dental Clinic and Dr. Lim to anyone looking for a thoughtful, professional, and compassionate dentist!

So far, best experience untuk klinik gigi.

reviews.name: hajar adam
reviews.text:
I went to this clinic to fill one cavity, but after consulting with Dr. Chew, she showed me that there were actually three, and one of them almost needed root canal treatment. She clearly explained the price range for my treatment.

The whole process took around 30 minutes, including the consultation, and there were no delays since I made an appointment.

I ended up getting two teeth filled because the condition was quite bad, and Dr. Chew explained the materials she used thoroughly. The procedure went smoothly. She even asked if I was in pain or wanted to stop after one tooth if I felt uncomfortable.

The total cost for filling two teeth was RM240, which I find quite reasonable, considering the extent of the decay.

I‚Äôd rate this clinic a solid 10/10. The staff were friendly and professional. Good job, LS Dental Clinic!

reviews.text:
I recently had a whitening treatment done by Dr. Jessica, and happier with the results! She was professional, gentle, and made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire process. My teeth look noticeably brighter, and the experience was completely painless.

A big thank you to the amazing staff as well‚Äîespecially San San, who was incredibly helpful and efficient with the appointment scheduling and follow-ups. The whole team was warm, welcoming, and made the entire visit smooth from start to finish.

Highly recommend this dental clinic if you‚Äôre looking for quality dental care and excellent service!
